ygData.subject: Re: Hmm..trying to get back to cleric questions.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... with ... Simply because a weapon has an effect does not mean it has no (or doesn t require) charges. I used the Midnight Mallet for a while and it had 5
ygData.messageBody:
> and yes....the SSOL's cleanse is an EFFECT....an effect is NOT coupled
with
> charges. And dex means SQUAT...its a rumor. I've had the SSOL go off
> constantly when burdened by Equipment than any other time. (same goes for
> the screaming mace) The mace SHOULD have charges according to the
> quest.....not my "own" ideas.

Simply because a weapon has an effect does not mean it has no (or doesn't
require) charges. I used the Midnight Mallet for a while and it had 5
charges of the walking sleep effect. I had to right-click on the mallet to
cause the effect.

Speaking of effects, has anyone else noticed that EQ seems to swap 'affect'
with 'effect'? Being as pedantic as I am, it annoys me every time I am told,
'You cannot remove this affect'. I have also noticed in Brad's posts to
alt.games.everquest that he uses effect instead of affect.

The other thing is, DEX is not affected by encumbrance at all, AGI is. So if
a weapon effect is dependant on DEX, being heavy won't make a blind bit of
difference.

Salt
